hypothesis: Recurring costs and vendor lock-in are major pain points

metadata.title: ZetisLabs — Automation without Zapier or Make | 100% Native Code
metadata.description: Tired of accumulating Zapier subscriptions? We build custom automations in native code. The code is yours, no vendor lock-in.

hero.subtitle: We build custom automations in native code. No monthly subscription, no operation limits, no dependency. Your tool, your code.

shock.title: What Zapier really costs you
shock.content: An average Zapier workflow: $50-200/month. Over 3 years: $1,800 to $7,200 — just to rent a tool.
shock.warning: And if the platform shuts down, changes prices, or removes an integration? You start from scratch.
shock.solution: With ZetisLabs: you pay once, the code is yours. Forever.
